name: githubcopilot-intdevextn
description: A professional VS Code extension with modern development practices

rk-idp.copilot.username.description: GitHub Copilot username for tracking AI suggestions and chat history

rk-idp.github.baseUrl.description: Enterprise GitHub base URL for repository and code review analytics

rk-idp.github.userPAT.description: Enterprise GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication

rk-idp.sonarqube.baseUrl.description: SonarQube base URL for static code analysis and quality gates

rk-idp.checkmarx.tenant.description: Checkmarx tenant identifier for security vulnerability scanning

rk-idp.checkmarx.baseUrl.description: Checkmarx base URL for SAST security scanning

rk-idp.checkmarx.userApiKey.description: Checkmarx user API key for authentication

rk-idp.appsecjira.username.description: AppsecJira username for application security issue tracking

rk-idp.appsecjira.baseUrl.description: AppsecJira base URL for security issue lifecycle management

rk-idp.appsecjira.userPAT.description: AppsecJira Personal Access Token for authentication

rk-idp.jira.username.description: Enterprise JIRA username for sprint and task management

rk-idp.jira.userPAT.description: Enterprise JIRA Personal Access Token for authentication

rk-idp.jira.baseUrl.description: Enterprise JIRA base URL for agile workflow management

rk-idp.dora.githubBaseUrl.description: DevSecOps GitHub base URL for DORA metrics tracking

rk-idp.dora.githubUserPAT.description: DevSecOps GitHub Personal Access Token for DORA metrics authentication

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
